problem.p: If the wood beam shown below is replaced with a steel beam of the exact same dimensions, what will happen to the bending moments along the length of the beam? Assume the loading remains the same.

choicegroup.label: If the wood beam shown below is replaced with a steel beam of the exact same dimensions, what will happen to the bending moments along the length of the beam? Assume the loading remains the same.
choicegroup.choice: The bending moments along the length will increase
The bending moments along the length will decrease
There will be NO change in the bending moments along the length

div.p: This beam is statically determinate so the material type will not affect the shear forces or bending moments. The allowable stress and deformations, however, will change.
